## HDOMImplementation.removeChild() method

Removes the child of `parent` at index `i` in the target.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeChild(parent: T, i: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parent | <code>T</code> | parent node in target (e.g. DOM element) |
|  i | <code>number</code> | child index |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
